history.proof: intros. qauto use: vec_change_succ, vec_change_same, vec_change_eq, vec_change_idem.

original: intros. intros H. rewrite <- H. symmetry. apply vec_pos_ext. intros p0. destruct (pos_eq_dec p0 p). - rewrite e. rewrite vec_change_succ. simpl. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. reflexivity. - rewrite vec_change_succ. simpl. destruct (in_vec_dec_inv _ _ _ (Nat.eq_dec)). + exists p0. apply f. + destruct i as [q Hq]. rewrite Hq. destruct (pos_eq_dec p q). * contradiction n0. apply (Pos.succ_inj p q). rewrite e0. rewrite Hq. apply pos_nxt. * apply vec_pos_plus.
